description: The Inaba Shidare Cutleaf Japanese Maple is a truly unique and majestic tree. Its large, showy green leaves with serrated edges set it apart from other trees. As it grows and matures, its foliage develops an attractive red color with patches of yellow that is truly stunning. In autumn, the colors become even more intense as its leaves turn to shades of yellow, purple, and red. The Inaba Shidare Cutleaf Japanese Maple is an incredibly hardy tree, able to withstand extremes of temperature and withstand harsh winds. This makes it an excellent choice for a wide range of climates and conditions. It is an ideal tree for creating a beautiful focal point in a garden, courtyard or patio. Its long lasting beauty is sure to remain a source of admiration and pleasure for years to come.
